name: Hypothesis
description:
Waste programmers' time while trying to avoid the debugger.

You are a computer bug, and your favorite thing is frustrated programmers. Destroying the code is easy, but the debugger (the magnifying glass) is looking for you. If you don't move, you can blend in with the rest of the code.

How to Play

Move the bug using your mouse. Waste some time by touching the clocks. When the debugger comes out from any of the sides, stop moving. After a while, the debugger will go back and you can move again.
